rules_text:
Pestilent Ghelhound can't block.
Whenever you sacrifice a nonland permanent, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return Pestilent Ghelhound from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text:
[i]Once a mangy street cur, now reborn in a more perfect vision. Nox shuddered. This was it.
The Ar'Ghul were eternal.[/i]
